name: fip
title: Fip
description: Start and explore the fip radio directly from Raycast
author: louison

commands.name: now
commands.title: Currently Playing Track
commands.subtitle: Fip Radio
commands.description: What's currently playing on fip radio

commands.name: prev
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.subtitle: Fip Radio
commands.description: The last track played before the current one on fip radio

commands.name: next
commands.title: Next Track
commands.subtitle: Fip Radio
commands.description: The next track to by played by fip radio

commands.name: start
commands.title: Start Playing
commands.subtitle: Fip Radio
commands.description: Starts VLC and play the fip radio audio stream

commands.name: stop
commands.title: Stop Playing
commands.subtitle: Fip Radio
commands.description: Pause fip radio stream on VLC
